front.title: Operations, Administration, and Maintenance for MPLS-SR over IP

abstract.t: Segment routing uses source routing paradigm to traffic engineering by specifying segments a packet traverses through the network. MPLS Segment Routing applies that paradigm to an MPLS data plane-based networks. SR-MPLS over IP uses MPLS label stack as a source routing instruction set and uses IP encapsulation/tunneling such as MPLS-in- UDP as defined in RFC 7510 to realize a source routing mechanism across MPLS, IPv4, and IPv6 data planes. This document describes Operations, Administration, and Maintenance operations in SR-MPLS over IP environment.
